description: Non-material amendment to planning permission 22/03514 (Variation of condition 2 (Compliance with approved drawings) 27 (Contamination - Site Investigation Scheme) 28 (Contamination - Site investigation and quantitative risk assessment) 29 (Contamination - Remediation method statement) of planning permission 21/02304 to condition 2 to reflect the new plans in order to implement the proposed changes, 27, 28 and 29 to allow for phased discharge of the conditions) to allow amendment of the wording of Condition 10, to exempt development within the refurbished Soane Stable Block. Current wording to be deleted and replaced with: 'No development, other than that related to the 'refurbishment' stage of works (works to the Soane Stable Block for ancillary uses for the Royal Hospital such as storage, office and visitor centre (Uses Class B1/D1)), shall be occupied until details of the cycle storage and shower facilities have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The facilities shown on the approved plans shall be fully implemented and made available for immediate use. The cycle facilities shall thereafter be retained for use at all times.'
site_name: Royal Hospital, Royal Hospital Road, LONDON, SW3 4SR
